Detailed Description

Support for signing.

Part of the CCNx C Library.

size_t  size,
int  bits_of_entropy 
)

Feed some entropy to the random number generator.

Parameters:
buf is the source buffer
size is in bytes
bits_of_entropy is an estimate; use 0 to make me guess
